about_the_game:
Fight It Out In Aria Skies!

Take flight in this non-traditional 2.5D fighter where positioning and movement are key! An easy-to-grasp control scheme allows anyone to come and join the battle. Get ready for a variety of modes, create a team of your favorite characters and battle with your friends locally or using Steam Remote Play!

Featuring six playable characters, five stages and heaps of configurations and modes.

The living clouds incarnate on Aria has granted a handful of fighters the magic ability of flight, who will come out on top?! Only one way to know, duke it out!

Key Features

  • Arcade Mode

Battle through a series of CPU-controlled opponents and try to beat your fastest clear time! Each character has their own unique route to face, complete with modifiers and team compositions that can only be seen in this mode.

  • Character Playstyles

Select and Battle with a team chosen from six unique characters, each designed to suit a different archetype of play, such as Striker or Zoner. Learn the ins and outs your favorite characters' moveset and characteristics to find a way to victory!

  • Game Rules and Party Modes

Want to add the chaos? Enable game rules like stage hazards that create new strategies; moveset randomization to keep everyone guessing the whole way through; change the default team size or form a team with a friend!

  • Character Theme Music

Each character has their own theme track to enjoy! Select the BGM yourself in Free Battle mode or let the automatic system pick a track fitting the upcoming battle!

Gamepad recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and higher (64 bit only)
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz | Intel Pentium G4400, 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 660 | Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit only)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
